page.syntax: Code_Text as C = append.run_silent(C layoutname [,C transaction_table_filter [,* arguments ]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of a previously created append operation.

argument.name: transaction_table_filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". An additional character filter expression for the transaction table that selects records to append.Optional.

page.description: Runs an Append operation without displaying any prompts
page.discussion: The APPEND.RUN_SILENT() method appends data using a previously defined append operation. Note : If you specify an optional filter argument, the filter is applied in addition to any filter that may have been defined as Part of the Operation. (You can check to see if a filter is defined as Part of an Operation by editing the saved operation, and selecting the "Select records" menu item.)
